title: Can I deprive my Atheist sons from my wealth? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: allah from canada he has two atheist sons if they are totally disbelievers they don't disbelieve in allah they're not your sons and they are not entitled to a penny of your wealth and if you're in canada you have all the right to write a will to your legitimate heirs your daughters and the other muslim sons and your wife and they can easily be excluded for their kuffur
